caption.p: FACT-MM TOI change from pre-ASCT baseline values (adjusted). FACT-MM TOI scale is 0 to 112. a Any maintenance therapy (solid line) versus no maintenance therapy (dashed line). b Lenalidomide-only maintenance therapy (solid line) versus no maintenance therapy (dashed line). c HRQoL at baseline, pre-ASCT, during follow-up, and at PD P values are paired t test comparisons between periods within treatment group. The TOI is the sum of the physical well-being, functional well-being, and "additional concerns‚Äù subscores. Autologous stem cell transplant (ASCT), Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Multiple Myeloma (FACT-MM), health-related quality of life (HRQoL), lenalidomide (LEN), least-squares (LS), progressive disease (PD), trial outcome index (TOI). aLS mean during the analysis period, b66 patients had PD, c45 patients had PD, d44 patients had PD
